meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>good</kanji> <kanji>like</kanji> is something you like really good, if that makes any sense. This thing is a <vocabulary>good</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>favorable</vocabulary> thing.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own!
